reg_pit.title: Review of 24 Hour Driving Prohibition Regulation

change.changenote: Section 2 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 273/2018, effective December 10, 2018.

bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purpose of section 215.1 (1) of the Act, the prescribed number of days within which a person may apply for a review of a driving prohibition review served under section 215 (2) (b) is 7 days.

change.changenote: Section 3 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 264/2010, effective September 20, 2010.

section.sectiontext: For the purposes of section 215.1 (1) (b) of the Act, the prescribed application fee is $50.
